Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2012 10:49PM pam70 wrote: We you in the early stages when the mammogram picked it up?
Posts.Title: breast cancer scaried and worried pam70 Moderators

Posts.Content: pam70 wrote: I am new to the forum. I am 41 years old had my first mammorgram last year was told it was normal. Went for my mammogram in Jan for yearly got call back saying that mamo showed questionable dense mass in right breast. Now i do self breat exams and had my ob/gyn exam in Dec and no lump can be felt. I have no other outward signs on my breasts that i have read about. I am scared that what they saw is cancer by what i have read on the internet about bc. Has anyone has this before that can give me any information. I am going today for a diagonstic mammorgram and am terrified of what it my be. I am hoping if it is bc that is it early stages.
